DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: CoordProc_3Dskull_BJLS-2861.R1
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Procrustes coordinates obtained through a Generalized Procrustes Analysis (GPA) on raw coordinates of 43 landmarks representing caviomorph cranial shape. To obtain average ProcCoord for each genus, a separate GPA was carried for each one in Morphologika 2.5.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: caviomorph rodents
cranial shape
evolutionary diversification
habitat
size
